name: goldsky
description: Goldsky provides the primary blockchain data ingestion layer for the VeritasVault.ai platform, enabling real-time event monitoring across multiple chains. This guide covers the setup and configuration of Goldsky subgraphs for Tezos, EVM chains, and EtherLink.

scripts.deploy:etherlink: cd etherlink && npx @goldskycom/cli subgraph deploy veritasvault/etherlink-mainnet --network etherlink-mainnet --from-config subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:tezos: cd tezos && npx @goldskycom/cli subgraph deploy veritasvault/tezos-mainnet --network tezos-mainnet --from-config subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:evm: cd evm && npx @goldskycom/cli subgraph deploy veritasvault/evm-mainnet --network ethereum --from-config subgraph.yaml
